title: aim:familyguyquote
body: <p>Dennis Miller - I don't want to go on a rant, here, but America's foreign policy  makes about as much sense as Beowulf having sex with Robert Fulton at the first  battle of Antietam. I mean when a neo-conservative defenestrates it's like  Raskolnikov filibuster deoxymonohydroxinate... [Peter is watching this on TV] <br />Peter Griffin - What the hell does rant mean?</p><p><a href="aim:goim?screenname=familyguyquote">aim:familyguyquote</a></p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2005-01-27

aim:familyguyquote

Dennis Miller - I don't want to go on a rant, here, but America's foreign policy makes about as much sense as Beowulf having sex with Robert Fulton at the first battle of Antietam. I mean when a neo-conservative defenestrates it's like Raskolnikov filibuster deoxymonohydroxinate... [Peter is watching this on TV]
Peter Griffin - What the hell does rant mean?

bodyNavItems.text: Just when I thought I had a good idea...
&#09834; Oh the weather outside is frightful... &#09834;
